gift_card_details.title: Amazon Pay Gift Card
gift_card_details.description: Use your Amazon Pay Gift Card to shop across millions of products on Amazon.in including electronics, fashion, groceries, and more.
terms_and_conditions: Multiple gift cards can be added.

gift_card_details.title: I Can Stay Gift Voucher
gift_card_details.description: Enjoy luxurious stay experiences at premium hotels across India with I Can Stay gift vouchers.
how_to_redeem: Apply gift card voucher code during checkout.
Your booking will be confirmed instantly.

gift_card_details.title: Hidesign Gift Card
gift_card_details.description: Shop premium leather bags, wallets, belts, and accessories from Hidesign stores or online.
how_to_redeem: Add your favorite products to cart.
Enter gift card code at checkout.
terms_and_conditions: Applicable online and in selected retail stores.
Cannot be clubbed with certain discounts.
Gift card cannot be redeemed for cash.

gift_card_details.title: Myntra Shopping Gift Card
gift_card_details.description: Redeem stress-free fashion shopping on Myntra across thousands of brands.
how_to_redeem: Go to myntra.com or Myntra app.
At checkout, select 'Gift Card' and enter the code.
terms_and_conditions: Applicable across most products with few brand exclusions.
Multiple cards can be used in one order.
Expiry depends on the issuing brand.
